titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide estate tax relief for victims of the terrorist-caused air plane crash near Lockerbie, Scotland, in 1988.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Prohibits the imposition of the estate tax on the transfer of the taxable estate of a citizen or resident of the United States who died as a direct result of the Pan American Airways Flight 103 terrorist disaster over Lockerbie, Scotland, on December 21, 1988.
